title: North Shore Residence / HEID Architects
description: The incredible Lake views and lush woodland areas around this unique mid-century modern home were reason enough to recreate its once-refined architecture through the lens of modern interior and exterior renovations.Â  Approaching the home, an elongated existing bridge, re-clad with wood decking and warm cedar shingles, provides an elevated experience; an illusion of suspension in the branches and canopies of the surrounding property, which opens further to expansive interior views of the Lake frontage.

title: Gensler to convert former Pfizer HQ into apartments in New York
description: American architecture studio Gensler has revealed designs for an office-to-residential conversion of the former Pfizer headquarters in Midtown Manhattan, which will hold 1,600 apartments across two towers.
